title: Hanjuku Sakka to "Bungaku Shoujo" na Muse
original_name: 半熟作家と“文学少女”な編集者【ミューズ】
sinopse:
Sequel to "Bungaku Shoujo" series, set some years after Touko graduation, where she's now working as supervising editor for genius novelist, Suzumenomiya Kaito.

The book is in Suzumenomiya Kaito's point of view.
